channel.title: Machine Learning on Cloud Robotics with AWS
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Cloud Robotics with AWS

item.title: Dataset labeling
item.description: Dataset labeling Amazon Rekognition provides an intuitive visual interface to make image labeling fast and simple. The interface allows you to quickly identify and label specific objects in images using bounding boxes with an easy click-and-drag interface.

item.title: Model inference
item.description: Model inference A Rekognition Custom Labels model has already been trained and validated for you to use in this workshop. Simply provide an image to the Rekognition model endpoint and you will receive the identity and location of objects in it.
